articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ku Sung Hae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ku Sung Hae
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of Winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and People's Artist Ku Sung Hae, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Funeral of Kang Ki Sop Held
articles.content:
Funeral of Kang Ki Sop Held
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- A funeral of Kang Ki Sop, alternate member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and general director of the General Administration of Civil Aviation , took place here on Tuesday.
					 Present there were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, officials concerned and family members of the deceased.
					
					 The participants and bereaved family members observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased before his coffin was carried out of the Sojang Club.
					
					 The hearse left for the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri.
					
					 A ceremony of bidding last farewell to the deceased took place at the cemetery.
					
					 Hwang Pyong So said in an eulogy that Kang Ki Sop who grew up to be a competent pilot under the care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il made a positive contribution to developing the country's air transport and rendered great service to successfully building the terminal of Pyongyang International Airport, upholding with loyalty the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is making a fresh history of the Juche-oriented civil aviation. 
					
					 He noted that Kang Ki Sop would be always among the Songun revolutionary ranks dynamically advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, adding that we would certainly build a reunified socialist power, his desire, on this land.
					
					 The remains of the deceased were buried in his grave.
					
					 Placed before the grave was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths in the names of the party and power organs, the General Administration of Civil Aviation and other units.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The foreign ministry of the DPRK gave a reception for the diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here on Wednesday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 106 (2017).
					 The diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here were present at the reception on invitation.
					
					 Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho in his speech referred to the fact that a dynamic all-people general offensive is now under way to carry out the highly important tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 He expressed thanks to various countries and international bodies for encouraging the Korean people in their efforts to recover from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province with sincere aid last year.
					
					 He said that the DPRK would boost the good-neighborly and friendly and cooperative ties with the countries advocating independence this year, too.
					
					 Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the diplomatic corps, hoped in his speech that the Korean people would achieve successes and make steady progress in carrying out the 5-year strategy for national economic development. 
					
					 He also hoped that lasting peace and stability would settle on the Korean peninsula, wishing the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity in the new year, too.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., GFSTK
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., GFSTK
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The 56th enlarged plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea (GFSTK) was held at the People's Palace of Culture here on Wednesday.
					 The meeting discussed the task facing the commissions at all levels, associations and societies to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 Present there were Ri Chung Gil, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission who is chairman of the GFSTK Central Committee, standing members, members and alternate members of the C.C., GFSTK, officials of associations and societies and officials of the General Federation in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 A report and speeches were made at the meeting.

articles.title: IT Products Popular in DPRK
articles.content:
IT Products Popular in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Rungna IT Exchange Company in the DPRK has recently developed intellectual phone alarm transmitter and automatic switch LED lamp, winning popularity among people.
					 According to Han Chun Ho, a researcher of the company, those products are more intellectual than those of other countries and were designed and manufactured in a modern basis.
					
					 The alarm transmitter sends a warning signal to wire phones or hand phones in different positions to prevent accidents.
					
					 It is used in the places where sensors are installed. 
					
					 It was highly appreciated at the National Exhibition of IT Successes 2016.
					
					 One turns on and off the automatic switch LED lamps of families and offices with remote controllers of other electronics products.
					
					 This automatic switch function can be applicable to the lamps of AC 220V and DC 12V.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men's Feats for Building Militia Forces
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men's Feats for Building Militia Forces
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year Address that members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and Young Red Guards should prepare themselves politically and militarily and maintain full combat readiness.
					 In the DPRK, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, together with the Korean People's Army, is the revolutionary armed forces of the Workers' Party of Korea which reliably defends the socialist country.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, in his early years, hewed out the unique road of building the revolutionary militia forces, setting a good example.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he advanced an idea that the people mean a state and rear and regular armed forces, formed para-military organizations including red guards and self-defence forces against the Japanese army and created the tradition and experience for building militia forces and establishing all-people defence system.
					
					 After liberating Korea through the all-people resistance, he formed militia organizations including the People's Self-defence Forces and firmly consolidated self-defense military capability of the country.
					
					 On January 14, Juche 48 (1959), he formed the Worker-Peasant Red Guards (WPRG) and constantly strengthened the militia forces, providing a sure guarantee for defending socialism.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to develop the militia forces during the protracted period of his Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership.
					
					 During his revolutionary activities at Kim Il Sung University, he made public many famous works to prove the validity of Kim Il Sung's policy of arming all the people and upheld his Juche-oriented idea and line of building the militia forces.
					
					 And he led the WPRG and other militia forces to successfully carry forward the tradition created in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and took necessary measures ranging from weapons to uniforms and bedclothes.
					
					 He guided the WPRG to bolster up its combat capabilities even in the period of the Arduous March, the forced march, and made sure that its might was fully displayed through the military parades held in celebration of the 60th and 63rd anniversaries of the DPRK.
					
					 Now, the WPRG is greeting the new heyday of its development under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Drama "Blood Vessel" Performed in Sariwon
articles.content:
Drama "Blood Vessel" Performed in Sariwon
Sariwon, January 25 (KCNA) -- A drama "Blood Vessel" has been staged in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, since Jan. 22.
					 The drama makes an artistic representation of the patriotic loyalty and spirit displayed by the workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex to increase the production of cement, true to the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is realizing the patriotic desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building a powerful socialist country at the highest level.
					
					 It was enjoyed by officials, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the city and the province.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Chairmen of Headquarters of Chongryon Express Will to Open up New Phase of Independent Reunification This Year
articles.content:
Chairmen of Headquarters of Chongryon Express Will to Open up New Phase of Independent Reunification This Year
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Chairmen of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Jan. 23 in support of the appeal adopted at the joint conference of the DPRK's government, political parties and organizations. 
					 Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, ardently supported the appeal of the joint conference to carry through the task of the country's reunification set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and thus glorify this year as a significant year to open up a new phase of independent reunification.
					
					 Jong Song Han, chairman of the Hokkaido Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the call of the joint conference to open up a new phase of independent reunification reflected all Koreans' will to reunify the country and encouraged the Koreans in Japan to the grand nation-wide advance for reunification.
					
					 So Chun Won, chairman of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, noted that when the July 4 joint statement and the October 4 declaration, provided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, were made public, the Koreans in Japan shouted hurrah with deep emotion together with the people in the homeland. He expressed his will to arouse all officials of the headquarters and compatriots to the prefecture to the nationwide reunification movement with high sense of national dignity.

articles.title: Japan SDF's Presence in Waters off S. Korea during Kwangju Popular Uprising Disclosed
articles.content:
Japan SDF's Presence in Waters off S. Korea during Kwangju Popular Uprising Disclosed
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that a Japanese warship of the Self-Defence Forces (SDF) was operating in waters off south Korea during the Kwangju Popular Uprising to gather intelligence, according to south Korean Yonhap News on January 22.
					 This fact was revealed through the record of top level secret communication which dealt with the role of the SDF in May 1980 by the U.S. Pacific Forces Command.
					
					 The director of the Institute for Peace and Reunification under the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea said that it was hard to guess the SDF gathered information about the area of Kwangju in high seas, expressing strong suspicion about the possible presence of forces in the inland.
					
					 The operation of SDF at that time is presumed to be "part of the U.S. scenario" as it was conducted within the same framework as that in which the U.S. deployed an aircraft carrier in waters off the Korean peninsula, he stressed.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Forces' Solicitation Diplomacy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Forces' Solicitation Diplomacy
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces, mired in troubles at home and abroad, are clinging to the coattail of their American master more tightly.
					 They flocked to the U.S. for the presidential inauguration where they hinted those concerned of the new administration at "diplomatic and security policy coordination", called for "cooperation in putting pressure on the north over its nukes" and went clumsy to curry favor with their master.
					
					 This is a humiliating act of the pro-U.S. lackeys keen on prolonging their remaining days by clinging to the U.S., chieftain of aggression and plunder which inflicted all sorts of misfortune and pain on the Korean nation, clean indifferent to the good faith shown by the fellow countrymen in the north to improve the north-south relations.
					
					 The puppet forces, barely managing their living amid censure and denunciation by the south Korean public, are caught in extreme uneasiness being cold-shouldered even by neighboring countries. 
					
					 What they are concerned most is the policy of the new U.S. administration towards the DPRK.
					
					 They are talking about "alliance" with the U.S. in a bid to give impression that they have independence but it is just to cover up their true nature as a poor colonial stooge whose politics, economy and even military are all dependent on their American master.
					
					 The U.S. considers the south Korean puppet forces as major stooges for executing its strategy for encircling and deterring its potential rivals in Northeast Asia by force of arms.
					
					 The puppet forces are dragged this way or that way by the U.S. and neighboring big powers, thus intensifying contradictions and conflicts between the U.S. and those big powers.
					
					 Now the U.S. regards south Korea as a harassing and vexing entity little short of an empty Kimchi jar.
					
					 That's why the puppet forces are shamelessly behaving to win favor of the U.S. in fear that the "alliance" and framework of "cooperation for pressure on the north" which they had kept with the previous U.S. administration would shake after the emergence of the new one.
					
					 It is by no means accidental that foreign media commented that south Korea is never in an equal partnership with the U.S., and that south Korea has unilateral obligation toward the U.S. and that is to cooperate with the U.S. in carrying out its Northeast Asia strategy.
					
					 It is a lesson and truth of history drawn by the Korean nation through life experience that sycophancy and dependence on foreign forces lead to national ruin.
					
					 The puppet forces, who are soliciting cooperation in the campaign to stifle their fellow countrymen, still pinning hope on foreign forces, not yet coming to their senses despite the burning shame sustained by it everywhere, should be thrown overboard at an early date.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Call for "Cooperation in Pressurizing North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Call for "Cooperation in Pressurizing North"
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- Traitor Hwang Kyo An, acting "president" of south Korea, called its ambassadors to Russia, China, the U.S. and Japan and the UN to Seoul on Jan. 16 for an urgent meeting for measures related to the issue of diplomacy and security. At this confab he cried out for close cooperation with the new U.S. administration, vociferating about "strong pressure upon the north to push it to denuclearization."
					 Meanwhile, traitor Kim Kwan Jin, chief of the security office of puppet Chongwadae, and mandarins of the puppet Foreign Ministry flew into the U.S. one on the heels of the other and begged for the above-said "cooperation" from the outset of the year.
					
					 A group of lawmakers of the diplomacy and unification committee of the puppet National Assembly visited the U.S. on the occasion of Trump's presidential inauguration and implored their American master for close cooperation and tightened "alliance" while talking about "gravity of the nuclear issue of the north". 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article terms this the last-ditch efforts of the puppet forces to prop up the international campaign for sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, though they had already been branded as a failed policy, and get rid of their tight-corner. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces' above-said campaign is an extreme treacherous one aimed to stand against the DPRK's efforts for improving the inter-Korean relations, block the cause for national reunification and realize their ambition for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 It is also designed to turn south Korea into an outpost for carrying out the U.S. strategy to dominate Asia-Pacific and escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The puppet forces' persistent diplomacy for such campaign would only make their position at home and abroad more difficult and further precipitate their miserable end.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The Obama administration's policy towards the DPRK failed and gone are the days never to return when the successive administrations of the U.S. impudently dealt with world affairs.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a commentary analyzing the above-said policy as regards the end of Obama's term of office.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Time has never been in favor of the U.S.
					
					 The serious lesson the Obama administration should draw from its policy towards the DPRK is that the U.S. can never win the confrontation with the DPRK as far as time is concerned.
					
					 All the timetables American strategists carefully shaped went wrong though they raked up their brains and used high performance computers.
					
					 When the victory of the DPRK and the defeat of the U.S. in the standoff are viewed by the time of departure of the Obama regime as a standard, the DPRK emerged a winner with a broad smile on its face while the U.S. wore a tearful face as the loser.
					
					 The lesson to be drawn from the total bankruptcy of the Obama administration's hostile policy towards the DPRK is that no force on earth can overpower Songun Korea, the country of the people holding fast to the spirit of self-development first.
					
					 The U.S. has few options at present.
					
					 Of course, the U.S. military has various war scenarios to reduce the DPRK to ashes in a short span of time through surprise preemptive nuclear strikes. But it is seized with uneasiness and fear that they may entail such disastrous consequences as pushing the U.S. to a final ruin.
					
					 Time urgently requires the U.S. ruling quarters to choose between the final ruin and peaceful co-existence with the DPRK. The time gone never comes back.
					
					 The U.S. had better make a bold decision to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Condemned for Advocating "Education in Love for Country"
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Condemned for Advocating "Education in Love for Country"
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is mulling drastically intensifying what it called "security education" from this year, talking about the "establishment of the right view of value and advocacy of the spirit of loving country", according to the "report on working plan for 2017" drafted by the puppet Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency.
					 Not content with the education in worship and flunkeyism towards America and the anti-communist education they have enforced so far, the puppet forces seek to include in the contents of the above-said education the sophism that the "alliance" with the U.S. played a "key role" in south Korea and it should be further strengthened to cope with the "north's nuclear and missile threat".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a cynical ploy of the puppet regime to implant illusion about the U.S. and the consciousness of blindly following it in the minds of south Koreans and fan up the confrontation with the compatriots in the north in a bid to cover up their thrice-cursed crimes committed against the nation through sycophancy and treachery and prolong their dirty remaining days.
					
					 The south Korean regime is no more than a puppet one incapable of exercising even elementary sovereignty and its politics is only designed to carry out the U.S. hostile policy for invading the DPRK.
					
					 The robber-like U.S. is keen on carrying out its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific, driving the south Korean puppet regime like a slave prolonging its remaining days by clinging to the sleeves of the U.S.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is escalating the confrontation between the north and the south and disturbing peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia, persistently standing in the way of national reunification, the cherished desire of the Koreans. 
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the south Korean puppet regime may let out to benumb the south Korean people's consciousness of independence against the U.S., misrepresenting this hard reality and advocating "love for the country" and the like, it can never stem the trend of the times towards independence and reunification.
					
					 Minju Joson terms the farce staged by the south Korean puppet regime the traitorous and anti-reunification ruckus which may be conceived only by hordes of sycophants and traitors who kowtow to the U.S. without an iota of national dignity.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Ruling Forces for Denying Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Ruling Forces for Denying Crimes
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) --  The Peace and Justice Commission of Catholic Church's Suwon Parish held a mass on the situation for recovering democracy in Suwon, Kyonggi Province on Jan. 23, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 The speakers said that chief culprits of abusing power employed a subterfuge that they have never committed wrongdoings, sparking off the anger of the people.
					
					 A statement, read out at the mass, denounced the "president" for labeling the candle-light public actions as the "order of the north", not content with the politics-business nexus and abuse of power, which threw society into chaos.
					
					 We'll do our best to wage a joint action with the forces standing for a new society while valuing justice, peace and worth of life, it said.

articles.title: S. Korean Internet Paper Denounces Conservative Group's Moves
articles.content:
S. Korean Internet Paper Denounces Conservative Group's Moves
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People Tuesday posted an editorial to denounce the "Saenuri Party" trying to change its signboard.
					 The editorial said that it has been a long time since the party was in the direst straits and its organizational collapse also comes nearer with the outbreak of "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal".
					
					 Five years ago, when the people became angry at the Lee Myung Bak "government", the "Grand National Party" changed its signboard as "Saenuri Party" under the baton of Park, the editorial noted.
					
					 It stressed that what is needed for the party at present is disorganization, not just change of its name.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Presents Its Written Opinion on Impeachment of Park Geun Hye to "Constitutional Court"
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Presents Its Written Opinion on Impeachment of Park Geun Hye to "Constitutional Court"
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People said that the people's emergency action to remove Park Geun Hye "government" held a news conference before the building of the "constitutional court" in Seoul on Jan. 23 where it demanded the court accept the motion to impeach Park.
					 The organization demanded the court accept the motion as soon as possible true to the intention of the people.
					
					 At the end of the press conference it presented a written opinion to the court.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Egypt
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Cairo on Jan. 19.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt and chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold a seminar, film show, photo exhibition and other political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits from Jan. 19 to Feb. 18.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported in Angola
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- An Angolan body and figures extended full support to the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The Angolan Women's Organization made public a statement on Jan. 9.
					
					 The statement fully supported the proposals for reunifying the country and the foreign policy stand advanced by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Un underscored the need to improve the inter-Korean relations, usher in a heyday of the nationwide reunification movement by the concerted efforts of the whole nation, develop the relations of good-neighborliness, friendship and cooperation with those countries championing independence and make concerted efforts with them to ensure genuine international justice in 2017.
					
					 We will further develop the relations of friendship and cooperation with the Korean people this year, too, it added.
					
					 The international secretary of the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola made public a statement on Jan. 10.
					
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address highlighted the need for developing the country's overall economy onto a higher plane and expressed his conviction that the Korean youth will perform fresh miracles and feats in this year's general offensive.
					
					 A department director of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said in a statement on the same day that Kim Jong Un's proposal for reunifying the country serves as the most realistic one enabling the Korean nation to reunify the country by its own efforts, and extended firm solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people, expressing the belief that they will achieve bigger successes in the building of a powerful country in 2017.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays to Be Marked in Austria
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays to Be Marked in Austria
Pyongyang, January 25 (KCNA) -- An Austrian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun (President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary) and the Day of the Shining Star (leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary) was formed in Vienna on Jan. 16.
					 Thomas Losh, secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary careers and undying exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the greatness of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on these anniversaries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ku Sung Hae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ku Sung Hae
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 25 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Ku Sung Hae, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung y Artista del Pueblo, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: MINREX ofrece banquete en honor de huespedes extranjeros
articles.content:
MINREX ofrece banquete en honor de huespedes extranjeros
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 106 (2017) de la Era Juche, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 25 un banquete en honor de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales acreditados en la RPDC. 
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho menciono que se desarrolla la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo para materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Expreso agradecimiento por el hecho de que en el ano pasado varios paises y organizaciones internacionales estimularon con la sincera ayuda la reparacion de los danos de las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					Enfatizo que en el ano en curso tambien la RPDC ampliara y desarrollara las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion con los paises que defienden la independencia. 
					
					El embajador palestino Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, quien preside el Cuerpo Diplomatico acreditado en la RPDC, deseo que el pueblo coreano logre exitos en el cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de economia nacional y alcance el desarrollo incesante. 
					
					Deseo la paz y estabilidad duraderas en la Peninsula Coreana y formulo votos por el mayor progreso y la prosperidad del amistoso pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion ampliada de 56o pleno de CC de Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion ampliada de 56o pleno de CC de Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion ampliada del 56o pleno del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea.
					El foro discutio las tareas de los comites a todos niveles, las asociaciones y los institutos academicos para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo. 
					
					Participaron el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea y del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnicas, Ri Chung Gil, los miembros permanentes, miembros y miembros suplentes del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencias y Tecnica de Corea, los funcionarios de las asociaciones e institutos academicos y los de la Federacion en la capital y las localidades. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo informe e intervenciones.

articles.title: ACNC comenta conducta halaguena a EE.UU. de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta conducta halaguena a EE.UU. de los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 25 de enero (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos, empantanados ahora en la crisis por dentro y por fuera, se muestran mas adulones a su patron norteamericano.
					Con motivo de la toma de posesion del nuevo presidente estadounidense, ellos viajaron en grupo a Estados Unidos y se reunieron con los funcionarios de la nueva administracion para debatir la "coordinacion de la politica diplomatica y de seguridad" y la "colaboracion en la campana de presionar al Norte de Corea en el tema nuclear".
					
					Esos vendepatrias proyanquis quieren mantener su vida politica rechazando la bondad de la connacional RPDC, que propuso mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, y obedeciendo a EE.UU., caudillo de agresion y saqueo que hizo sufrir mucho a la nacion coreana.
					
					En la actualidad, las autoridades surcoreanas viven inquietadas siendo condenadas por la poblacion surcoreana y maltratadas por los paises vecinos.
					
					Lo que les preocupa es la politica de la nueva administracion norteamericana sobre la RPDC.
					
					Aunque ellas fingen ser independientes hablando de la "alianza" con EE.UU., no pueden ocultar su miserable fachada de lacayos coloniales que confian lo todo a su amo gringo como politica, economia y asuntos militares.
					
					Para EE.UU. que implementa ahora la estrategia de formar cerco y disuadir de manera militar a los rivales potenciales de la region del Nordeste Asiatico, sus principales ejecutores materiales son los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Se agravan la contradiccion y la disputa entre EE.UU. y las potencias perifericas porque los titeres surcoreanos se dejan llevar una vez por el imperio y la otra vez por los paises vecinos.
					
					EE.UU. considera al Sur de Corea como una molestia.
					
					Por esta razon, los titeres surcoreanos estan muy preocupados por el posible aflojamiento de la base de la "alianza" y "cooperacion en presionar al Norte en el tema nuclear".
					
					No es casual que los medios extranjeros comentaran que el Sur de Corea no tiene relaciones igualitarias de aliado con EE.UU. y asume ante este la obligacion unilateral de cooperar en la estrategia norteamericana sobre el Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					La obediencia y dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras es el camino de arruinamiento del pais: esto es la leccion sacada por la nacion coreana a traves de sus vivencias y una verdad de la historia.
					
					Deben ser exterminados cuanto antes los traidores surcoreanos que solicitan a las fuerzas extranjeras el aplastamiento a la parte connacional.
